results.title: My legs are getting old: sinvastatin-induced polyneuropathy.
results.text_hl: An 82-year-old female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ presented with a complaint of @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ and discomfort in her lower limbs after 7 years of therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The results of an electromyographic study were compatible with @<m>DISEASE_Polyneuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011115 @@@polyneuropathy@@@ (@DISEASE_Sensorimotor_neuropathy_with_ataxia_autosomal_dominant @DISEASE_MESH:C537197 @@@sensorimotor axonal neuropathy@@@--moderate to severe).

citations.NLM: Camargos EF, Oliveira Lde F, Boaventura Tde D. My legs are getting old: sinvastatin-induced polyneuropathy. BMJ Case Rep. 2011 Mar 3;2011():. PMID: 22707627
citations.BibTeX: @article{22707627, title={My legs are getting old: sinvastatin-induced polyneuropathy.}, author={Camargos EF and Oliveira Lde F and Boaventura Tde D}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2011}}

results.title: Simvastatin treatment in the SLO syndrome: a safe approach?
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment in the @DISEASE_Smith_Lemli_Opitz_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D019082 @@@SLO syndrome@@@: a safe approach?

citations.NLM: Starck L, Lövgren-Sandblom A, Björkhem I. Simvastatin treatment in the SLO syndrome: a safe approach? Am J Med Genet. 2002 Nov 22;113(2):183-9. PMID: 12407710

results.title: [Cerebrotendinous xanthomatosis].
results.text_hl: Neurophysiological tests detected a sensory @<m>DISEASE_Polyneuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011115 @@@polyneuropathy@@@ in the legs.

citations.NLM: Burghaus L, Liu W, Haupt WF. [Cerebrotendinous xanthomatosis]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2007 Jul 29;132(27):1463-6. PMID: 17583829
